My name is Emir Biscevic, I'm a dynamic, driven and creative Mobile UX and UI Designer with almost a decade of User Experience Design & Product Development. Working with various start-ups and brands in fast paced collaborative environments has made me custom to both lean and agile development processes.

Lean UX Design

My passion is to take ideas and transform them into products that aim to fulfil customer and business goals. For real humans.

Interaction design
IxD helps understand how building blocks and components work in harmony throughout the user-interface.
Responsive design
The art and science to organize, structure and label products to support usability and findability. At this stage many ideas are explored.

IxD helps understand how building blocks and components work in harmony throughout the user-interface.
Information design

Prototyping
The art and science to organize, structure and label products to support usability and findability. At this stage many ideas are explored.
